SerializableOptional<T> - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Model
Re-implementation of the Optional but serializable.
If the value is ot null isEmpty return false, and the isPresent returns true.

The methods in the class are a copy of the original methods.
The only method different from the original is of(T value), which if the value is null return an empty SerializableOptional otherwise returns a SerializableOptional with its value equals to the value passed.
SerializableOptional(T) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Model.SerializableOptional
Constructors of the Serializable optional.
